testcase.name: When @test is "empty($x:result/self::element(foo))" (i.e. boolean), then the HTML report should be "Result" = "<foo />" and "Expecting" = "empty($x:result/self::element(foo))" without diff.
When x:expect expects <bar /> and @test is "$x:result/self::element(foo)" (i.e. non boolean), then the HTML report should be "Result" = "<foo />" and "Expected Result" = "<bar />" with diff.
